mai.models

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • mai.models.Cube
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasInvariant

    public class Cube
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasInvariant
    Author:
    maint
    Define a cube 3 dimensions (e.g. 5x5x5). Generate random characters (based on ASCII) at every position on a cube. Or assign characters to positions on a cube from a file of characters.

      • invariant

        public boolean invariant()
        check invariant for a cube. A cube is NOT invalid when:
      • the size is smaller than 4
      • the size is bigger than 1000
      • there is at least one invalid character
      • the number of different characters on one lattice is smaller than 2
      • the number of different characters on one lattice is greater than 100
Specified by:
invariant in interface HasInvariant
